Name: Whisky Flower
Ingredients: 60 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice) SHAKE again with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Basically an elderflower whisky sour with added interest due to the use of an Islay malt.
History: Created by Robert Williams at Mamasan, Glasgow, Scotland.
Nutrition: One serving of Whisky Flower contains 256 calories
